---
title: "US Police Shootings"
author: "Ketan Mittal"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
--- 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
shooting_data <- read_csv("shootings.csv")
attach(shooting_data)
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = shooting_data, aes(x =as.factor(race), fill = as.factor(state))) + 
  geom_bar() + labs(y = "count", x = "race")
       
```
